en.subtitle: Online booking and aftercare with protective film (Saniderm/Emalla).
aftercare: Keep film on for 24–48h. If it leaks, replace with new film.
Wash gently with fragrance‑free soap. Pat dry.
Moisturize 2–3×/day with thin layers. No scratching or picking.
Avoid pools, sun, and heavy workouts 1–2 weeks.
